section: Green New Deal for New York Act
title: Green New Deal for New York Act
text: Taxes the rich to raise over $10 billion a year to fund a variety of  programs, including energy efficiency, social housing, mass transit, renewable energy, and  electric vehicles. These programs would maximize good, union jobs and investments in low  income communities and communities of color.
contact: Contact Patrick Houston, NY Communities  for Change, phouston@nycommunities.org
